welcome_message_body: Welcome to Los Alcarrizos, a charming city known for its vibrant culture, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Yao Asian Cuisine
restaurants.description: Yao Asian Cuisine is a asian restaurant located in Santo Domingo.
restaurants.address: Av. República de Colombia, Plaza Vértice II, Altos de Arroyo Hondo, Santo Domingo

restaurants.name: Krispy Kreme
restaurants.description: Krispy Kreme is a donut shop located in Santo Domingo.
restaurants.address: Ave. Nuñez de Caceres (Oloff Palme), 10131 Santo Domingo

restaurants.name: Yokomo Sushi
restaurants.description: Yokomo Sushi is a sushi restaurant located in Santo Domingo.
restaurants.address: Lorenzo Despradel #13 (Plaza Los Prados II), 10131 Santo Domingo

restaurants.name: Panadería & Repostería Ilemar
restaurants.description: Panadería & Repostería Ilemar is a bakery located in Distrito Nacional.
restaurants.address: Calle Eugenio Deschamps 40 (Calle Font Bernard), 10131 Distrito Nacional

restaurants.name: Tiro Libre
restaurants.description: Tiro Libre is a peruvian restaurant located in Distrito Nacional.
